articles.title: Fallout 76 drops new Xbox achievements with free update - TrueAchievements
articles.description: It's a big day for Fallout 76, which is getting three new achievements with the free Atlantic City – America's Playground update today, as well as Season 16.
articles.content: More Fallout 76 achievements have just dropped, as today sees the free Atlantic City America's Playground update arrive with three new Fallout 76 Atlantic City - America's Playground achievements, al… [+2113 chars]
